message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll give you 40, but I'm worth more!
I'll give you 40, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't expect too much!
I'll give you 45, but I'm not getting taken advantage of again!
I'll meet you halfway, but don't expect me to give up too much!
